column3: ProphecyText
Receiving financial assistance from {0}, whom Connor helped a lot {1}, he will be able to obtain the medication necessary for his declining health.
To everyone's surprise, Connor's exceptional ability in {0} will be a great help in his {1} job, to the point of being promoted.
While walking by {0}, Connor will stumble over an old chest protruding from the sand. Inside, he will find a {1} of inestimable value.
{0} will be at the height of happiness when Connor gives her the financial boost she needs to start her {1} business.
Despite not being well off, Connor will help {0} to buy the necessary {1} for her job. Struck by his selflessness, she will fall in love with him.

During a philosophical conversation with {0} in {1} too complicated for him, Connor will understand everything wrong. He will wrongly deduce to go and invest in stock options of {2}... with success, against all odds.

While on a mission near {0} with {1}, the latter will risk dying by falling into a dangerous place, which Connor will protect her from thanks to his agility and strength. {1} will be eternally grateful to him.
Connor will win an all-inclusive trip to {0} at a game show where he will invite {1}, spending an invigorating vacation
Connor will take pity on {0}, who will in bad shape after an accident with {1}. He therefore will decide to help her with her rehabilitation by {2} with her, with success.
In order to find an excuse to see {0} regularly, Connor will follow her idea to enroll together in the municipal course to get better at {1}, which he will comme to enjoy dearly.

Too earnest about {0}, Connor will faint from fatigue. In the ambulance, he will have a near-death experience where he will see {1} talking to him about {2}, which he will never see in the same way ever again
As he strolls along the seashore of {0}, Connor will realize that only working in such an environment can satisfy him. He will therefore make {1} his profession
{0} will join the same company as Connor thanks to a recommendation from him.
Connor will manage to convince {0} to send him on a mission to {1}, allowing him to see {2} to convince her to at least remain friends.
Connor will understand that to excel at his job, he will have to improve his {0} skills, which he will do under the guidance of {1}
After {0} have taken many times Connor to {1}, he will understand the importance of preserving its wilderness and will devote himself to its protection
Knowing every nook and cranny of {0}, Connor will take {1} there to have fun {2}. The date will remain an unforgettable memory for them both.
Contemplating the wild life at {0} will allow Connor to understand how big the wold is. Wanting to extend his knowledge of this vastness, he will try to get knowledgeable about {1}.
Connor won't know what to wear to a dance where he will have already invited {0}, but {1} will bring him the perfect trendy accessory, made from the {2}
After having fun {0} the whole evening with {1}, Connor will have a deep chat with her over a dish of {2}. Every time he thinks about the meaning of life, Connor will remember that meal.
As he will pass by the church in {0}, Connor will notice {1} coming out of the confessional. He will take advantage of this to offer to confide her worries, at a much appreciated time.

{1} anywhere will have become a much too popular practice, leading to a surge of accidents the hospital of {0} won't be able to face on its own. Connor will use his sense of justice and his muscles to transport the afflicted, which will earn him both money and fame.
